comment:
Mashed strike at 53L, added  28.5g Gypsum and 4.5g CaCl in 46L to give Ca-183ppm, Mg-2ppm, Na- 6ppm, SO4-350ppm, Cl-52ppm. one beer cap full of lactic. Ph measured at start of mash 5.5, one beer cap lactic about 2.5ml added. 
30L Sparge water dose 14g gypsum, 5g Cacl, one beercap lactic (about 2.5ml)
Volume of strike water:	
53.01 (Liters)
Temperature of strike water:	
74.7 (C)
Strike grains with 53.01 L of water at 74.7 (C)
Mash at 68 °C for 45 min.
Vorlauf and lauter 39.4 L in your first runnings.
Add 25.6 L of sparge water at 75.5 °C.
Vorlauf and lauter 25.6 L in your second runnings.
Your combined runnings should be 65 L.
